lead_paragraph: Here is an email from February 2015 in which Stephen Busch is responding to worries from the Environmental Protection Agency and stating that the city had a corrosion control program, or added chemicals that prevent leaching of dangerous metals like lead, in place. This turned out to be false. (Source: FlintWaterStudy.org)

headline.main: Stephen Busch Email Responding to E.P.A. Concerns on Corrosion Control

snippet: Here is an email from February 2015 in which Stephen Busch is responding to worries from the Environmental Protection Agency and stating that the city had a corrosion control program, or added chemicals that prevent leaching of dangerous metals like lead, in place. This turned out to be false. (Source: FlintWaterStudy.org)
